languages.text: "Тогда изменники примут наказание как должное. Я никогда не полагался на свою должность как на гарант неприкосновенности, и не буду даже пытаться изменить ваше суждение... если оно будет взвешенным и справедливым".
"Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."
languages.original_text: "Тогда изменники примут наказание как должное. Я никогда не полагался на свою должность как на гарант неприкосновенности, и не буду даже пытаться изменить ваше суждение... если оно будет взвешенным и справедливым".

traits.locale_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to change your decision... if it is fair and balanced."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “如果他们真的犯了罪，那叛徒必定会得到应得的惩罚。我根本不打算凭借我的特权来包庇罪行，我甚至不会试图左右您的决定……我只希望您能做出公平的评判。”
languages.original_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."

traits.locale_text: “如果他们真的犯了罪，那叛徒必定会得到应得的惩罚。我根本不打算凭借我的特权来包庇罪行，我甚至不会试图左右您的决定……我只希望您能做出公平的评判。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Dann werden die Verräter ihre gebührende Strafe akzeptieren. Ich habe mich nie auf meine Position als Immunitätsgarantie verlassen, und ich werde nicht versuchen, Eure Entscheidung zu beeinflussen ... so lange sie gerecht und neutral ist."
languages.original_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werden die Verräter ihre gebührende Strafe akzeptieren. Ich habe mich nie auf meine Position als Immunitätsgarantie verlassen, und ich werde nicht versuchen, Eure Entscheidung zu beeinflussen ... so lange sie gerecht und neutral ist."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces los traidores recibirán el castigo que merecen. Nunca he utilizado mi cargo como una garantía de inmunidad y ni siquiera haré el amago de influir en su criterio... mientras sea justo y ecuánime».
languages.original_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces los traidores recibirán el castigo que merecen. Nunca he utilizado mi cargo como una garantía de inmunidad y ni siquiera haré el amago de influir en su criterio... mientras sea justo y ecuánime».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, les traîtres accepteront leur châtiment. Je n'ai jamais pris ma position pour une garantie d'immunité et je ne ferai rien pour influer sur votre décision... du moment qu'elle est juste et impartiale. »
languages.original_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, les traîtres accepteront leur châtiment. Je n'ai jamais pris ma position pour une garantie d'immunité et je ne ferai rien pour influer sur votre décision... du moment qu'elle est juste et impartiale. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「それなら、裏切り者は相応の罰を受けるでしょう。私は免責保証のために自分の立場を当てにしたことはありませんし、あなたの決定を揺るがそうとも思いません…それが公正でバランスの取れたものである限りは」
languages.original_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、裏切り者は相応の罰を受けるでしょう。私は免責保証のために自分の立場を当てにしたことはありませんし、あなたの決定を揺るがそうとも思いません…それが公正でバランスの取れたものである限りは」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "O zaman hainler, hak ettikleri cezayı alacaktır. Konumumu hiçbir zaman dokunulmazlık garantisi olarak görmedim ve sizin kararınıza karşı çıkmaya teşebbüs edecek değilim. Adil ve makul olduğu sürece tabii."
languages.original_text: "Then the traitors will accept their due punishment. I have never relied on my position as an immunity guarantee, and I will not even try to sway your decision... as long as it is fair and balanced."

traits.locale_text: "O zaman hainler hak ettikleri cezayı alacaktır. Konumumu hiçbir zaman dokunulmazlık garantisi olarak görmedim ve sizin kararınıza karşı çıkmayı denemeyeceğim bile. Adil ve dengeli olduğu sürece tabii."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
